bill.title: Homebuyer Assistance Program; establish to provide loan for down payment/closing cost, to be repaid with federal tax credit.
bill.description: An Act To Establish The First-time Homebuyer Credit Down Payment/closing Cost Loan Assistance Program, Which Shall Be Administered By The Mississippi Development Authority; To Provide That Under The Program, A First-time Homebuyer Who Is Eligible For The Federal First-time Homebuyer Tax Credit May Receive A Second Mortgage Loan From The Mississippi Development Authority For Assistance With Down Payment And Closing Costs In Connection With A First Mortgage Loan; To Provide That The Second Mortgage Loan Will Be Repaid With The Funds That The Buyer Will Receive From The Federal Government From The Tax Credit; To Direct The Mississippi Development Authority To Promulgate Rules And Regulations Regarding The Terms Of The Program; And For Related Purposes.
